alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm approaching Blackfoot Reservoir from south through 715 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a weak thunderstorm 7 miles south of Henry, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackfoot Reservoir and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Blackfoot Reservoir, consider moving to shore. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
